ModMetaData.name: Cows With Guns
ModMetaData.author: Zylle
ModMetaData.description:
Cows with guns will raid your base! You can recruit them if you want, but they're terrible workers. They're cows.
REQUIRES humanoid alien races: https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=839005762 Load after humanoid alien races.
Requires a new save.
This is not a serious mod. There are probably balance issues, tell me if you run into any trouble
